**Your responsibilities:**

**Instance Details:**
- ID: i-0e2c7fb68a308e8e7
- Type: g4dn.xlarge (4 vCPU, 16GB RAM, Tesla T4 16GB)
- Region: us-east-1
- IP: 3.236.47.203
- SSH: `ssh -i ~/.ssh/stes-first-key-pair.pem ec2-user@3.236.47.203`
- Ollama endpoint: http://3.236.47.203:11434

**Common Commands:**
```bash
# Check instance status
aws ec2 describe-instance-status --instance-ids i-0e2c7fb68a308e8e7 --region us-east-1

# Start instance
aws ec2 start-instances --instance-ids i-0e2c7fb68a308e8e7 --region us-east-1

# Stop instance (saves money!)
aws ec2 stop-instances --instance-ids i-0e2c7fb68a308e8e7 --region us-east-1

# Check Ollama service
ssh -i ~/.ssh/stes-first-key-pair.pem ec2-user@3.236.47.203 'sudo systemctl status ollama-remote'

# Test model endpoint
curl http://3.236.47.203:11434/v1/models
```

**Always confirm before stopping** the instance. Provide cost estimates when suggesting actions.
